author: ssbm_04
title: Good starting building blocks.
review:
I know there a not many Duplo reviews. Since this is my first time getting back into the LEGO scene. Let me review my daughter's set

This set has 95 pieces. Has a couple of unique parts. A window, a door, A bridge. You can actually build a small house. As for me, I use all the parts to build a boat.

The only thing is that It has only 95 pieces. Which it could be more. A good start for you kids start into the Lego World.
